title: 27 January 1973 Biltmore Hotel Murder (Mehmet Baydar- Bahadir Demir) İnvestigation Reports

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: 27 January 1973 Biltmore Hotel Murder (Mehmet Baydar- Bahadir Demir) İnvestigation Reports
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

First of all, I would like to extend my sincerest love and respect to your esteemed authority. For my master's degree, I am researching the murder of Consul General Mehmet Baydar and Consul Bahadır Demir, who were killed by Gourgen Yanikian at the Biltmore Hotel in Santa Barbara in 1973. Of course, in order for my study to be fully finalized, I need official reports prepared and recorded by you. I would be very grateful if you could help me with this. I would also like to emphasize that this study will not be used for any other purpose.
Sincerely regards
Gulseda H. Celebi

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Gülseda H. Çelebi

title: NYC Council records related to oversight hearing

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of any and all correspondence to or from any and all New York City Council members and to or from personnel in their offices (including without limitation all email correspondence sent to or from any email address within the @council.nyc.gov domain) referencing or pertaining to a Health Committee oversight hearing, concerning NYC Animal Care Centers, scheduled for June 18, 2024, including correspondence pertaining to the scheduling and deferment of said hearing (linked below), from May 1, 2024 through May 30, 2024.

https://legistar.council.nyc.gov/MeetingDetail.aspx?ID=1196621&GUID=C18DF77D-73EF-414A-ABB0-B80E87C90570&Options=info%7C&Search=

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brad Aaron
